{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Videographer",
  "description": "Stay Assist Limited is where travel meets lifestyle, whether you are booking a weekend getaway or settling in for an extended stay. Our hospitality-tech platform links guests directly to vetted homeowners, eliminating middlemen and hidden agent fees, while enriching every visit with local dining, events, rides, and cultural experiences, all in one seamless app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Videographer

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

Responsibilities


	Plan, film, and edit video content for various platforms (e.g. social media, website, events, campaigns, internal communications)
	Collaborate with the Communications team to develop video concepts and storyboards
	Set up and operate video equipment, including cameras, lighting, and sound
	Edit footage to create polished final products, including motion graphics and subtitles where needed
	Maintain an organized archive of video assets and footage
	Stay up to date with industry trends and incorporate fresh ideas into visual storytelling
	Capture live events, interviews, and behind-the-scenes content as needed
	Ensure all video content aligns with brand identity, tone, and communications goals


Requirements
What We&rsquo;re Looking for:


	Proven experience as a videographer or in a similar role (portfolio required)
	Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve
	Strong knowledge of video equipment, lighting, and sound setup
	Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment
	Excellent storytelling, visual, and editing skills
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Experience with motion graphics, animation, or drone footage (a plus)


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;career@stayassist.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Videographer &ndash; StayAssist&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Videographer Job at Stay Assist Limited




        
    

        
        Stay Assist Limited is where travel meets lifestyle, whether you are booking a weekend getaway or settling in for an extended stay. Our hospitality-tech platform links guests directly to vetted homeowners, eliminating middlemen and hidden agent fees, while enriching every visit with local dining, events, rides, and cultural experiences, all in one seamless app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Videographer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Plan, film, and edit video content for various platforms (e.g. social media, website, events, campaigns, internal communications)
	Collaborate with the Communications team to develop video concepts and storyboards
	Set up and operate video equipment, including cameras, lighting, and sound
	Edit footage to create polished final products, including motion graphics and subtitles where needed
	Maintain an organized archive of video assets and footage
	Stay up to date with industry trends and incorporate fresh ideas into visual storytelling
	Capture live events, interviews, and behind-the-scenes content as needed
	Ensure all video content aligns with brand identity, tone, and communications goals


Requirements
What We’re Looking for:


	Proven experience as a videographer or in a similar role (portfolio required)
	Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve
	Strong knowledge of video equipment, lighting, and sound setup
	Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment
	Excellent storytelling, visual, and editing skills
	Good communication and interpersonal skills
	Experience with motion graphics, animation, or drone footage (a plus)


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@stayassist.com.ng using "Videographer – StayAssist" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Full-Stack Developer",
  "description": "StayAssist is where travel meets lifestyle, whether you are booking a weekend getaway or settling in for an extended stay. Our hospitality?tech platform links guests directly to vetted homeowners, eliminating middlemen and hidden agent fees, while enriching every visit with local dining, events, rides, and cultural experiences, all in one seamless app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-Stack Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;

Responsibilities


	Design, build, and maintain the StayAssist platform (mobile app + backend + admin dashboard).
	Develop key features including booking, payments, user onboarding, listing management, maps, and messaging.
	Implement and manage integrations with external APIs (payments, KYC, geolocation, etc.).
	Set up foundational architecture, dev ops, and CI/CD pipelines for fast and secure deployment.
	Ensure platform reliability, scalability, and responsiveness from day one.
	Collaborate with design and product to continuously improve UX/UI across the platform.
	Provide guidance on tech stack decisions and long-term architecture strategy.


What We&rsquo;re Looking For


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree
	3+ years of experience in full-stack or mobile-first development.
	Proficiency in frameworks such as React Native, Flutter, or equivalent.
	Strong backend experience using Node.js, Django, Laravel, or similar.
	Experience building and scaling user-facing platforms (ideally in hospitality, mobility, or marketplace sectors).
	Familiarity with cloud services (Firebase, AWS, or GCP).
	Understanding of secure authentication, data protection, and user privacy protocols.
	Strong sense of product ownership, clean code practices, and MVP-first thinking.
	Bonus: Experience with booking systems, multi-vendor platforms, or working with African tech infrastructure.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Portfolio, GitHub, or a few links to products you have helped build to:&nbsp;career@stayassist.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Full-Stack Developer &ndash; StayAssist&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

Full-Stack Developer Job at Stay Assist Limited




        
    

        
        StayAssist is where travel meets lifestyle, whether you are booking a weekend getaway or settling in for an extended stay. Our hospitality?tech platform links guests directly to vetted homeowners, eliminating middlemen and hidden agent fees, while enriching every visit with local dining, events, rides, and cultural experiences, all in one seamless app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Full-Stack Developer

Job Location:  Abuja (FCT) 

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design, build, and maintain the StayAssist platform (mobile app + backend + admin dashboard).
	Develop key features including booking, payments, user onboarding, listing management, maps, and messaging.
	Implement and manage integrations with external APIs (payments, KYC, geolocation, etc.).
	Set up foundational architecture, dev ops, and CI/CD pipelines for fast and secure deployment.
	Ensure platform reliability, scalability, and responsiveness from day one.
	Collaborate with design and product to continuously improve UX/UI across the platform.
	Provide guidance on tech stack decisions and long-term architecture strategy.


What We’re Looking For


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	3+ years of experience in full-stack or mobile-first development.
	Proficiency in frameworks such as React Native, Flutter, or equivalent.
	Strong backend experience using Node.js, Django, Laravel, or similar.
	Experience building and scaling user-facing platforms (ideally in hospitality, mobility, or marketplace sectors).
	Familiarity with cloud services (Firebase, AWS, or GCP).
	Understanding of secure authentication, data protection, and user privacy protocols.
	Strong sense of product ownership, clean code practices, and MVP-first thinking.
	Bonus: Experience with booking systems, multi-vendor platforms, or working with African tech infrastructure.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Portfolio, GitHub, or a few links to products you have helped build to: career@stayassist.com.ng using "Full-Stack Developer – StayAssist" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Graphic Designer",
  "description": "Ginger Travelz is a new age travel management company, that takes pride in providing all travel needs to their clients and to give them long lasting memories.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphic Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ojodu Berger, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Design visually appealing graphics for web, social media, and print.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to develop engaging content.
	Ensure brand consistency across all design projects.
	Stay updated with industry trends and incorporate them into designs.
	Create and edit videos and animations as needed.
	Develop layouts and templates for marketing materials.
	Assist in the creation of visual presentations and reports.
	Manage and organize digital assets and design files.
	Review final layouts and suggest improvements as needed.


Requirements


	Recent graduate in any field (BSc &amp; HND).
	Must have completed NYSC.
	Good written and verbal communication skills
	Proven experience as a graphic designer.
	Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g. Canva, Photoshop, Corel draw etc.).
	Excellent attention to detail and creativity.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to:&nbsp;careers@smartflowtech.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as subject of email.",

  "validThrough": "1200-07-17",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

Graphic Designer Job at Ginger Travelz




        
    

        
        Ginger Travelz is a new age travel management company, that takes pride in providing all travel needs to their clients and to give them long lasting memories.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphic Designer

Job Location: Ojodu Berger, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Design visually appealing graphics for web, social media, and print.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to develop engaging content.
	Ensure brand consistency across all design projects.
	Stay updated with industry trends and incorporate them into designs.
	Create and edit videos and animations as needed.
	Develop layouts and templates for marketing materials.
	Assist in the creation of visual presentations and reports.
	Manage and organize digital assets and design files.
	Review final layouts and suggest improvements as needed.


Requirements


	Recent graduate in any field (BSc & HND).
	Must have completed NYSC.
	Good written and verbal communication skills
	Proven experience as a graphic designer.
	Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g. Canva, Photoshop, Corel draw etc.).
	Excellent attention to detail and creativity.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: careers@smartflowtech.com using the Job Position as subject of email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Experience / Community Manager",
  "description": "Stay Assist Limited&nbsp;is where travel meets lifestyle, whether you are booking a weekend getaway or settling in for an extended stay. Our hospitality-tech platform links guests directly to vetted homeowners, eliminating middlemen and hidden agent fees, while enriching every visit with local dining, events, rides, and cultural experiences, all in one seamless app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Experience / Community Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)

Responsibilities


	Support with Heart: Respond to guest and host inquiries across live chat, email, and social media with warmth, speed, and clarity.
	Smooth Onboarding: Guide new guests and hosts through KYC verification, account setup, and listing/booking best practices.
	Trust Building: Enforce quality and safety standards through proactive communication and issue resolution.
	Community Vibes: Help cultivate our host and guest communities through events, feedback loops, and personalized engagement.
	Spot Trends: Identify recurring user issues or feature requests and relay insights to Product, Marketing, or Ops.
	Track &amp; Improve: Use data and tools to monitor satisfaction, response times, and resolution quality, then work with the team to constantly raise the bar.


What We&rsquo;re Looking For


	Experience in hospitality, travel tech, or community support roles.
	Familiarity with KYC or verification processes.
	Multilingual abilities (are added advantage)
	Interest in local culture, food, and events, or just a curious traveler at heart!
	Bonus: Experience with booking systems, multi-vendor platforms, or working with African tech infrastructure.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;career@stayassist.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Customer Experience and Community Manager - StayAssist &quot;as the subject of the mail.",

Customer Experience / Community Manager Job at Stay Assist Limited




        
    

        
        Stay Assist Limited is where travel meets lifestyle, whether you are booking a weekend getaway or settling in for an extended stay. Our hospitality-tech platform links guests directly to vetted homeowners, eliminating middlemen and hidden agent fees, while enriching every visit with local dining, events, rides, and cultural experiences, all in one seamless app.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Experience / Community Manager
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Support with Heart: Respond to guest and host inquiries across live chat, email, and social media with warmth, speed, and clarity.
	Smooth Onboarding: Guide new guests and hosts through KYC verification, account setup, and listing/booking best practices.
	Trust Building: Enforce quality and safety standards through proactive communication and issue resolution.
	Community Vibes: Help cultivate our host and guest communities through events, feedback loops, and personalized engagement.
	Spot Trends: Identify recurring user issues or feature requests and relay insights to Product, Marketing, or Ops.
	Track & Improve: Use data and tools to monitor satisfaction, response times, and resolution quality, then work with the team to constantly raise the bar.


What We’re Looking For


	Experience in hospitality, travel tech, or community support roles.
	Familiarity with KYC or verification processes.
	Multilingual abilities (are added advantage)
	Interest in local culture, food, and events, or just a curious traveler at heart!
	Bonus: Experience with booking systems, multi-vendor platforms, or working with African tech infrastructure.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@stayassist.com.ng using "Customer Experience and Community Manager - StayAssist "as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketing Specialist",
  "description": "Snaarp is your comprehensive all-in-one solution for safeguarding your enterprise with cutting-edge technology, seamless security, and unmatched reliability to protect against evolving threats.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a creative and results-oriented Digital Marketing Specialist to develop, implement, track and optimize our digital marketing campaigns across all digital channels.
	Our ideal candidate should be able to proactively research market trends and create/optimize product campaigns.
	You will be responsible for developing and implementing effective digital strategies to drive brand awareness, website traffic, and lead generation.
	If you live and breathe digital marketing, we want to meet you.


Responsibilities


	Develop marketing strategies that align with the organization&#39;s business goals
	Manage and execute campaigns across various digital channels, including email, social media, search engines, and display advertising
	Measure and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
	Conduct market research and analyze trends to identify new opportunities and improve campaign performance
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to produce engaging content and optimize user experience
	Stay up-to-date with emerging digital marketing trends and technologies
	Create engaging content for digital platforms, including website, blog, and social media posts.
	Optimize website content and user experience to improve search engine visibility and drive organic traffic.
	Prepare reports and presentations to communicate campaign results and insights.
	Design, build and maintain our social media presence
	Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in marketing, communications, or related field
	5+ years of proven experience in digital marketing
	Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, including SEO, PPC, social media, email marketing, and display advertising
	Proficient in marketing automation tools
	Excellent analytical skills and experience with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics)
	Demonstratable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM
	Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate
	Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.


Skills &amp; Requirements:


	Understanding of Marketing Fundamentals
	Knowledge of Digital Marketing Channels
	Analytics proficiency
	SEO and SEM Expertise
	Content Creation Skills
	Social Media Management Capability
	Creativity in Campaign and Content Development
	Well-organized and detail-oriented
	Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.
	Exceptional communication and writing skills
	Strong project management skills
	Ability to multitask and manage projects in a fast-paced environment.
	Self-motivated with a passion for learning and professional development.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV &amp; Portfolio to:&nbsp;hr@snaarp.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-08-16",

Digital Marketing Specialist Job at Snaarp




        
    

        
        Snaarp is your comprehensive all-in-one solution for safeguarding your enterprise with cutting-edge technology, seamless security, and unmatched reliability to protect against evolving threats.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a creative and results-oriented Digital Marketing Specialist to develop, implement, track and optimize our digital marketing campaigns across all digital channels.
	Our ideal candidate should be able to proactively research market trends and create/optimize product campaigns.
	You will be responsible for developing and implementing effective digital strategies to drive brand awareness, website traffic, and lead generation.
	If you live and breathe digital marketing, we want to meet you.


Responsibilities


	Develop marketing strategies that align with the organization's business goals
	Manage and execute campaigns across various digital channels, including email, social media, search engines, and display advertising
	Measure and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
	Conduct market research and analyze trends to identify new opportunities and improve campaign performance
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to produce engaging content and optimize user experience
	Stay up-to-date with emerging digital marketing trends and technologies
	Create engaging content for digital platforms, including website, blog, and social media posts.
	Optimize website content and user experience to improve search engine visibility and drive organic traffic.
	Prepare reports and presentations to communicate campaign results and insights.
	Design, build and maintain our social media presence
	Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or related field
	5+ years of proven experience in digital marketing
	Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, including SEO, PPC, social media, email marketing, and display advertising
	Proficient in marketing automation tools
	Excellent analytical skills and experience with web analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics)
	Demonstratable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM
	Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate
	Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.


Skills & Requirements:


	Understanding of Marketing Fundamentals
	Knowledge of Digital Marketing Channels
	Analytics proficiency
	SEO and SEM Expertise
	Content Creation Skills
	Social Media Management Capability
	Creativity in Campaign and Content Development
	Well-organized and detail-oriented
	Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.
	Exceptional communication and writing skills
	Strong project management skills
	Ability to multitask and manage projects in a fast-paced environment.
	Self-motivated with a passion for learning and professional development.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV & Portfolio to: hr@snaarp.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
